SEARCH
Package model

Class Capsule

java.lang.Object
model.Capsule
public class Capsule extends Object
The Capsule class represents a Capsule object, which is a piece of content created by a collaborator. The Capsule contains a unique identifier, a description, a capsule type (technical, management, domain, or experience), a collaborator (name and position), a learning statement, a list of keywords (hashtags), a URL, a status (under review or approved), and an approval date (if the capsule is approved).

    • Capsule

      public Capsule(String description, String capsuleType, String collaboratorName, String collaboratorPosition, String learning, String status)
      Constructs a Capsule object with the given parameters and generates a unique identifier for it.
      Parameters:
      description - a string containing the capsule's description.
      capsuleType - a string containing the capsule's type (technical, management, domain, or experience).
      collaboratorName - a string containing the collaborator's name.
      collaboratorPosition - a string containing the collaborator's position.
      learning - a string containing the capsule's learning statement.
      status - a string containing the capsule's status (under review or approved).
